name: wunpm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: wunss(co(c0, cpm, c1), c2, cpw(cxp(c1, c0)), w0)

|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpm, c1), c2))

-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c1, c0), c2))

stmt.origin: a1i(w0, wss(co(c0, cpm, c1), cpw(cxp(c1, c0))))

comment: A weak universe is closed under partial mappings. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
